text: Ben Sammut (born 13 February 1975) is a former professional rugby league footballer who played primarily as a in the 1990s and 2000s. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Cronulla-Sutherland Sharks players Category:Newcastle Thunder players Category:Hull F.C. players Category:Malta national rugby league team players Category:Living people Category:Rugby league fullbacks
